text: Usse lareowas & usse leorneras & þa halgan apostolas & ure bisceopas beodaþ eallum þæm mæssepreostum þe heom underþeodde syndon þæt hi heora hadas on riht gehealden, & gode bysne ætywan Godes folce þe ge rihtan sceolon, & þæt ge ne geþafien þæt hi hiora lif on unriht libben, & þæt ge hit him ne cyþen þær hi hit doþ & wyrceaþ.

Þonne ærest we beodaþ þæt ge god don & yfel forlæten, & lufiaþ eowerne drihten & eowre þa nyhstan, eal cristen folc, mid eallum mode & mid eallum mægene, & scyldaþ eow wið þa uncysta þara eahta heafodleahtra, þæt is oformodnes & manslæhtas & mæne aðas, unrihthæmed, morðor & gitsunga, lease gewitnessa, nið & yrre, stala & tælnessa & drycræftas.
& þa ðe nu swylcera synna andetnessa & rihte dædbote her ne doþ, hi þonne mid deofle gesigaþ on helle, þær nis nauþer ne andetnes ne forgifnes.

Nu bidde we eow & myndgiaþ þæt ge don soðe dædbote eowra synna, for þon hell hafað seofon witu: þæt forme wite is ece hungor, oþer is ece þurst, þridde is ece cyle, feorþe is fyres hæto, fifte is ece wyrma slite, syxte is ece fulnes, seofoþe ece smyc & þrosm.

& se preost se þe hæbbe nunnan oð his ende, oððe læwde man se þe hæbbe cyfese ofer his <æwe>, oððe hwa him to gesybne man hæbbe oð his endedæg, syn hi ealle amansumude of ealra heofonwara haligdome & eorþwarena.

Ne gesinge þær nan man nane mæssan þær hi inne syn, ne husl ne gehalgodne hlaf ne sylle, ne hi nan man ne byrge binnan gehalgodan mynstre, ne furþum to hæþenum pytte ne bere, ac drage butan cyste butan hi geswicon.

& gif ða mæssepreostas þissa ænig mid him witon & nellaþ him styran & forbeodan hira unriht, oððe feoh æt nymaþ, oððe gif þa ðe ure spræce sprecan sceolon & him feoh æt nymaþ & forswigiaþ & nellaþ us hit cyþan, þonne syn hi ealle amansumade of Godes bletsunge & of ure, buton hi hit gebetan willon.
Wa, la, þam mannum þe mid deoflum sculon habban hyra eardungstowe, þær bið sar butan frofre & ermþa butan are & weana ma þonne æniges monnes gemet sy þæt hit asecgean mæge.
Swa hit awriten stondeþ & þus cweden.
Se salmscop us sang þysne cwide be deaþes onlicnesse & be hellegryre.

Ðonne syndon þreo deaþas <leornode> on bocum: an þara deaþa bið þæt mon swelte on his synnum; ðonne bið oðer deaþ þæs lichoman & þære saule gedal; ðonne bið se ðridda deaþ þæt he bið on helle cwylmed, þær ne mæg nænig sawl hire waldend herian for þon sare þe hire onsiteð.
Ðonne sindon þreo lif leornode on bocum be soþfæstum monnum: an lif him bið be flæsce; & oðer him bið be Godes willan; & him bið þæt ðridde lif on þære toweardan worulde mid eallum halgum.
& se deaþ is to ondrædanne for þon nænig mon nis þæt hine mæge befleon.

Þeah se mon eardige on middum burgum & on middan his mægþe betweoh hundteontigum þusenda manna mid wepnes ecgum, & þeah he si hundteontig þusenda fæþma under eorþan in iserne cyste belocen, hwæþere he sceal sweltan.

& se deaþ is iunglic, for þon þe cild sweltaþ & unmagan, & he is freolic & þeowlic, for þon cyningas sweltaþ & þeowutlingas, & se deaþ ys eac snotorlic, for þon þe dwolan sweltaþ & uþwiotan, & se deað is unrotlic & bliðelic, for þon þe synnie sweltaþ & halige.
Þæt is <wel> <wyrðe> þæt he sy unrot þæm synfullum for þæm him næfre æfter ne cumaþ ne beforan ne beoþ gemette for þære gemetnesse þara ecean tintrega þær hi sceolan beon aa butan ende.
& se deað bið bliðe halgum mannum for þon gesceade wið eorþwelum, þe him ær wæron fræmde on mode, & for þære onseone heora <waldendes>.
Þonne eal monna cyn ne mæg wordum asæcgan ne ariman þæs deaþes gryre for þæm gedalum þe on him syndon.
Þæt æryste gescead bið lichomon & saule.
Þæt bið syþðan uncuþ hwæþer seo saul gemeteþ swa god swa yfel, swa hire gegearwod bið & hire geearnung wæs on worulde.
For þæm æghwylcum bið sundorstow geteod þa ðe he him selfa ær geworhte.
Þonne is <þæt> <þridde> gescead wið eallum eorþweolum.

Ac se deaþ bið egeslic for þære biternesse, for þon he betyneþ þa eagan from gesihþe & þa earan from gehernesse & þa geaglas from sprece & þa fet from gange & þa handa from weorce & þa nysþyrlu from swæcce, & þonne æt nyhstan he betyneþ ealra scyldygra saula on helle.
Eala, wa þæm þe his ende þyllic sceal beon.
Þonne syndon fif hella onlicnessa her on worulde leornode on bocum.
An is worc noma, for þon an is micel cwealm þe hine tosceadeþ & afylleþ þæt him syþðan ne lysteþ ne goldes ne seolfres, ne he ne wunsumaþ þisses woruldlican þrymmes, þeah he him sy eal to gelæded.

Þonne bið þære æfteran helle onlicnesse her on worulde oferyldo <nemned>, þonne him þa earan adeafiaþ þa ðe ær mehton geheran fægre sangas, & seo tunge awlyspaþ seo þe ær hæfde ful recene spræce, & þa fet aslapaþ þa þe ær wæron swifte & hræde to gange, & þa handa þindaþ þa þæ ær hæfdon hwæte fingras, & þæt feax afealleþ þæt ær wæs long on wæstmum, & þa teð ageolugiað þe ær wæron on hwitum hiwe, & þæt orþ afulaþ þe ær wæs on swetum swæcce.
Þonne is þære ðriddan helle onlicnesse deaþ noma; ne areð hine metes gifernes ne gestreon ne ricetere.
Þonne is seo feorþe hell byrgen genemned; þæs huses hrof is genyþrod for þon hit him siteþ onufan on þæm breostum, & his gestreona þæt wyrreste þæt bið þonne hine mon besiweð on anum hrægle.
Siþðan hine mon gebringæþ æt ham, hafaþ him þonne syþðan þreo gebeddan, þæt bið greot & molde & wyrmas.

Þonne is þæt fifte hell susl nemned, for þon þeah seofun men syn, mid twam & hundteontigum gereordum swa ealles middangeardes is, & wære þara æghwylc a to life gescepen, & þara æghwylc hæbbe seofun heafdu þara ælc seofun tungan & þara ælc sy iserne stæfne, þa ne magon ealle atellan helle wito.
Heo is swa micel swa from heofnas hrofe oð niðer on þas eorþan.

& þeah þæt lengost treow stonde on middangearde on þæm hehstan clife oððe munte, & þonne <mon> gebinde þa fet þæs monnes to ufewardum þæm treo þe wære ane niht on helle, & him þonne læte hangian þæt heafod adun þæt him sige þæt blod on syx healfa ut þurh þone muþ, & hine þær sece elc þara yfla þe æfre on eorþan fram <anginne> <secgean> <gehyrde> & hine þonne þa sæyþa cnyson & beaten þe heo mid hire brogan forþbringæþ, þonne wile he þis eall lustlice geþafian, þeah he scyle syx <þusenda> wintra & eac þæt ðusend þe domesdæg on gewyrþ, wið þon þe he næfre ma þa helle ne gesece.
For þon wa þam þe beoð gelædde to þære stowe.
Eala, wa þæm þe cunnon godspel secgean & Godes folc læran & ne willaþ for heora gemelæste.
Þæm bið wa æfre geborenum þe hit ne wille mid inneweardre heortan geheran & healdan.
On helle bið wop butan frofre, hreownes butan are, þær bið þeowdom butan freodome, & unrotnes butan gefean.
Ne bið þær cyninges worþung ne ealdes wurþnes ne iunges hersumnes ne gesibbes lufu for þon sare þe hire onsiteþ.

La hwæt, we us huruþinga ne ondrædaþ þæt we dæghwæmlice geseoþ beforan urum eahum ure nehstan sweltan, & þenne þæm lænan lichoman bið laðlic legerbed gegearwod & in þære caldan foldan lið gebrosnod, & þæt læne lic þær weorþeð to fylnesse & grimmum gylstre & þæm wælslitendan wyrmum to mete.

Hwæt, þæt þonne bið sarlic sar & earmlic gedal lices & saule gif se earma innera mon, seo sawul, sceal slidan in þa ecean helle & in þa ecean witu mid ðone awergdan gast Antecrist, & þær mid deofle drohtnaþ habban, in morþre & in mane, in susle & in sare, on wean & on wyrmum, betweonan deaþum & deoflum, in bryne & on biternesse, in balwum & on bradum lege, in earmþum & on earfeþum, & on sweartum bryne & on swiltcwale, on sarum & sorgum & on fyrenum <ægldum>, on fylnessum & on fracoðnessum, & on toþa gristbitunge & in <tintergum> & on eghwylcum ormodnessum earmra saula, on cele & on wanunge, on hungre & on þurste, on hæto & on nacodnesse, on <nearunesse> & on ecre forwyrde, on arleasnesse & on missenlicum cynna witum, & in fæþme þæs beornendan dracan se þe is deoful cweden.
Uton us for þon bewarnian þæt micle deoful Antecrist mid helle witum, & wuton beon gemyndige usra sylfra saula in gehealdnesse Godes beboda.
Uton forletan yfel & don god, on þon þe we þuruhteon mægen.

Forlæten we morþor & mæne aþas & oferhygde, æfeste & andan & idelne gylp & arleasnesse & oferfylle & unrihtwisnesse & unnytnesse & unrihthæmed & ærætas & ealogalnesse & oferfylle & unsibbe & dyrne geligre & drycræftas & deofulgeld, druncennesse & gedwolan, fracoddæde & gitsunge & gifernesse, leahtor & leasunge & laþwende niþas & <heteþoncas> & treowleasnesse, & æghwylce synne þissum gelice þa þæm lichoman <bið> eaþe in to slidenne.
Þær bið ofergyten ealle þa god þa ðe men on eorþan ær lufedon.
Þonne is leornod on bocum þæt an deoful sæde anum ancran be helle wite mid hire tintregum.
He cwæþ þæt nære þes <middangeard> eall mid his wæstmum næs þon mara þe se seofoþa dæl eorþan þæs þe wæter ne geseceþ.
Þonne is se mycela garsecg se þe ymbe þas eorþan utan ligeð swiþe ormetlice mycel & nys þæs middangeard þon mara be him þe an prica on weaxbrede.

Þa cwæþ þæt deoful to þæm ancran: þeah mon þone garsecg mid isernum weallum utan betyne, & hine þonne fyres afylle up oþ heofnes hrof, & hine þonne utan besette mid smiþbylium & heora æghwylc oðrum ætrine, & sy to ælcum þara man togeset & ælc þara manna hæbbe Samsones strenge (& se Samson ealle <Fillestina> þeode gererde & heora duguþe afylde, & he hæfde twelf loccas & on ælcum locce he hæfde twelf manna mægen) & man þonne sette iserne þele ofer þæs fyres hrof & þæt sy eall mid mannum afylled & heora æghwylc hæbbe hamor on honda, & hit þonne aginne eal samod brastlian & þa bylias blawan & þæt fyr dynian & þa hamoras beatan, hweþere for eallum þyssum gedyne ne mæg seo sawl awacian seo þe wæs ær ane niht on helle.
For þæm is wa þam þe helle geseceð, & bið wel <þæm> þe hi forgæþ & mote heofona rice gesecean, þæt man ne mæg wordum asæcgean.
Þær bið lif butan deaþe & iugoþ butan yldo & hælo butan sare & dæg buton nihte.
Ne þearf mon þær leohtes <sunnan> ac þær bið leoht genoh of ælmihtegum dryhtne geond eal heofna rice.
Þær beoþ þa wuldorlican sangas ealra ðrymma.
Þær næfre ne bið ne hungor ne þurst, ne cyle ne gryre, ne bryne ne broga, ne atol ne yld, ne granung ne gnornung.

Þa cwæþ þæt deoful to þæm ancran: Þeah smætegylden mor sy æt sunnan upgange on neorxnawonge, & se oferlicge ealle eorþan, & cynebearn sitte onufan þæm, & þæt sy on middre ylde, & þeah he mote sittan <oþ> <ende> <his> <lifes>, & he hæbbe Salomones wlite & his wisdom, & him sy eal middaneard on gewæald geseald mid þæm gestreonum þe heofonas behwealfeþ, & him ælc stan wære gylden, & him ealle streamas hunige flowen, & him þonne on eorþan nære nænig wiðerbroga, & þeah him sie ealle sangcræftas to gesamnode þæt hine afrefrian, & him sie ealle <swetnessa> mid eaðnessum geboren, þeah nyle he on eallum þyssum wuldre gewunian gif he wæs ane niht on heofonum.
Þonne soðlice ure drihten is to þon mildheort & we syndon him to þon leofe gif we tala doþ & wel wyllað, þæt he sona wile ussum þingungum onfon.
Swa he seolfa cwæþ: Nelle ic þæs synfullan monnes deaþ, ac ic wille þæt he leofge & sy gecyrred from his synnum.
For þon <þam> þe butan andetnessa & butan dædbote heora lif geendiaþ her on worulde, þonne ne becumaþ heo æfre to ængum life ne to ænigre reste, ac heo beoþ sceofone in þa ecan tintrego helle wites.

Uton we þonne geearnian, þa hwile þe us God þisses lifes geunnan willæ, þæt we ne syn æfre mid arleasum monnum & synfullum witned, ac we geearnien þæt we moten mid rihtwisum monnum & mid mildheortum becuman to þære ecan eadignesse & rixian mid ure drihtne aa on wuldres wonge butan ælcum ende.
